code: import React from'react';import{X,AlertCircle}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NotificationPanel=_ref=>{let{notifications,onClose}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"absolute top-16 right-6 w-80 bg-white shadow-lg rounded-lg z-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center px-4 py-2 border-b",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:"Notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{className:"w-5 h-5 text-gray-600 hover:text-red-500"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-h-80 overflow-y-auto",children:notifications.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"p-4 text-sm text-gray-500",children:"No new notifications."}):notifications.map((note,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-start gap-2 px-4 py-3 border-b",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertCircle,{className:"text-yellow-500 w-5 h-5 mt-1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-800",children:note.message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-gray-400",children:note.timestamp})]})]},index))})]});};export default NotificationPanel;
